website_summaries.verdict: The best way to carry all of your treats and dog-walking must-haves in one convenient location.
pros: Easy-access opening draws tightly closed with adjustable string
Removable inner liner is easy to wash. Includes two pockets for extra storage
Connects to waist with a heavy-duty clip
cons: Clip is quite strong and is tough to get on at first

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Drawstring broke within 1 week. My dog never touched it and I wasn't rough with it. Pretty disappointed. I will be returning and finding something else.
customer_reviews.author: matty2524

customer_reviews.title: Great pouch for treats, poop bags, whatever.
customer_reviews.text: I carry poop bags with handles in the treat pouch itself, and it works great as an over shoulder bag.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great pouch, needs slightly longer straps
customer_reviews.text: Great pouch! Holds lots of treats as well as my Samsung Note in a cover and poop bags. Only complaint is that the straps need to be a bit longer for my BF who prefers to wear it messenger style (and he's not a big guy).
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the first one that we got, but love the new design even more. The drawstring on the side is a better design and the clip is a nice option. Makes dog walking so easy.
customer_reviews.author: ScottD777

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Its really well made and easy to use - the perfect gift for a Dog walker!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra From boston

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have dog treat crumbs in the pockets of all my jackets, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KW58

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag. Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Amazing customer service! They emailed me a few days after i got the puch to make sure i was happy with it. Love the metal clip!
customer_reviews.author: Brodie Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: half a star mince came broken i couldnt close the bag
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn s.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a week
customer_reviews.text: Closing/tightening strap broke off where the knot is.. Only lasted about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: The drawstring broke after using it twice. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The drawstring broke after using it twice. I have returned it to the manufacturer. I am hoping they will replace it. Yet to hear. It's been weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Beauregard

product_meta.title: Tuff Mutt Dog Treat Pouch for Training with Poop Bag Dispenser, Includes 1 Roll of Earth Rated Pet Waste Bags, Metal Clip, Adjustable Waist Belt Makes it Easy to Carry Treats, Kibble and Accessories
feature_bullets: 3 EASY WAYS TO WEAR: Train in comfort any way you choose! Use the removable 44" adjustable waistband/shoulder strap, or strong durable metal belt clip. Made of lightweight weatherproof nylon fabric this versatile bag is the perfect fit for any occasion.

HOLDS KIBBLE, TREATS, & TOYS: The drawstring pouch holds appox. 2 cups of small kibble. Also great for carrying a tennis ball or other accessories. The bright green interior makes it easy to see your treats so you can reward your pup quickly.

SECURE YOUR KEYS, and MONEY: With 2 zippered pockets, you and your pup can take more with you on your next outing. Need more space? Our two D-rings give you another spot to attach your keys or training clicker.
PERFECT FOR WALKS OR TRAVEL: Designed for more than just training, this bag makes the perfect accessory to take with you on your walks and runs, or even when you and your best friend are on the go.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Conveniently improve your dog training sessions, and everyday adventures, or your money back.
